Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder-section of a light-brown pottery ribbed vessel, the fabric is partially grey-black in section, the interior is thinly covered with a brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of one line of red-painted Coptic text, writ large.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394430) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394430)
